author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: Good Evening everyone. How’s your day today? Me? Kinda bored. Got a new phone. But I’m ok.

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: Me, going through Twitter while Seeing my favorite artists making more content. https://t.co/ow0EQ0xDz0

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: What’s it feel like being a popular Twitter user or YouTuber?

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: The Mk4 fought through every front of south Florida, from Opa Locka to Plantations. When the Panzer IV H2 heavy tank made it to the front, the Mk5 was built to counter the beast. To this day, The F.G.Ts holds the huge role to the M.R.A, supporting the army, even after the war.

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: When USA and the allies joined the Republic side, they rebuilt the vehicle numbers that the M.R.A lost after Andover Lakes. The M.R.A later designed the Mk4, which was the most produced F.G.T variant since the Mk3. The Numbers of M.R.A vehicles skyrocketed, over 1500 were built.

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: When the I.P.E won the Battle of Andover lakes, 94% of all M.R.A vehicles and F.G.Ts were destroyed. The Republic was left with only few Mk3s and War Armored Cars, which were slowly getting taken out by the Empire, one by one. All of that soon changed when USA joined the war.

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: To make matters worse, when Puerto Rico was knocked out of the war due to Hurricane Maria, the F.G.T production completely stopped and the M.R.A still got a lot of Mk3s with them, so it’s a fight for Survival.

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: The process was slow for transporting F.G.Ts to Florida from P.R, delivering way back from the right side. It took 5 days or more to deliver the new F.G.Ts to the frontlines. With Puerto Rico being the only one supporting the M.R.A, it was a rough time for the both of them.

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: When State War 1 began on mid-late 2015, the M.R.A continued with their F.G.T program and built the Mk3, which was heavily used during on almost every battle before 2018. Over 500 F.G.T Mk3s were built from Puerto Rico.

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: The first F.G.T was designed in 2014, with the following of the Mk1 prototype, which holds a 40mm cannon. With only one crew, it was hard for the tanker to drive and shoot at the same time, so many weeks later, the Mk2 was built, with a driver and an engine ventilation.

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: The “Field Gun Tank” Or famously know as the F.G.T, was the main tank of the M.R.A. Used as a support or a sniper, these tanks are the infantrymen’s best friend. There were 5 versions of the F.G.T tree, from the Mk1 to the Mk5. There’s even a AA and a heavy version as well. https://t.co/4eD4wzgUcv

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: Days passed by, My mind keeps switching from positive and negative, over and over and over again, don’t know what to do in Twitter but to like what a like and other people’s progress. What if I just random tweet about my things and what I made? Soon or never? I just don’t know.

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: Drawing isn’t really my kind perhaps, I wanna do 3D stuff with my content. Soon in the future.

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: My first drawings of these two armies. https://t.co/inShUzpnef

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: Name a Popular duo. I’ll wait. (The Rifleman and The Conscript.) https://t.co/JFZQXREbly

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: The original pic https://t.co/GUGrpUT8td

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: My very first commission from an artist. This is the early of my Panzer.IV H2 heavy tank. https://t.co/fWxHZ8tzZC

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: So Don’t give up, no matter what the situations or consequences you’re facing, Push on amigo, I know you can do it. Your path is your own personal history. And someday, you’ll go down in history.

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: Like most of you out there in the world, I like memes as well. Sometimes it make you happy or mad, laugh, cry, or the “WTF” feelings. But I’m sure that YOU, can be a great creator someday. I just started mine, nothing to much, but I’ll approve soon or later.

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: I was inspired by popular and famous YouTubers and Artists for their own content, creativity, imagination, and designs. I wish I could be one someday. There maybe consequences during the process, but it’s a risk to take in your own path.

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: Need help of “How to get popular?” or “How to be a Popular one?” Or something idk. Maybe I’m not motivated enough or just have to think of something to catch the attention, sometimes it will or does not.

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: So, um… How’s your day? Good? Bad? Whatever it is, I’m just asking.

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: I’ve been tweeting since March and I haven’t got any response, until I realized that there is a lock next to my name, now today I managed to unlock, so that you can see me now. Check me out. Pls.

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: Hello? Can anyone see me now?

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: The Specialists of the two armies. https://t.co/fP7OpAfXeC

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: In fact, I made a early version of M.R.A ball. This one is a 2018-present version. I’ll redesign it soon in the future. https://t.co/FOqeBZ4pFD

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: In the future, I’ll be making a country ball-like design for these two. They’re both not countries, but they were made from a country. El Republic forces were originated from Puerto Rico. The I.P.E was originated from different enemies of America and NATO, in the Imperial way.

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: The First two Factions from SW1 is El Manati Boriquen Republic Army and The Imperial Poker (or Anti-Ally) Empire Army. They fought against each other from September 2015-December 2019. The Empire is stronger than El Republic, but the Republic is a little clever than the Empire. https://t.co/i6lGpDDjGe

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: Sorry for lying about showing my things on Twitter. Got a lot of irl stuff to do. Someday, I’ll tweet about my creativity.

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: Soon, I’ll be posting my own content in pictures and I’ll tell you what it is. Ok?

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: So yeah. That’s most about me. I hope you have a great day, if not, then I hope you’ll be ok. Also… I’m a virgin…😐 so um… you can leave now…😑

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: I’m also kind of a shy person, since I don’t speak too much to anyone, especially my favorite people and famous ones. But I’m very inspired by their creativity and their progress, for what they done for all of us, hoping that I can do the same like them.

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: I’m kinda friendly and mean at the same time, but not too mean. Sometimes I get serious about Jokes and other things that people make fun about and all, and sometimes i get frustrated while playing games, but I hope things will get better for me soon.

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: I have a Xbox One, a Nintendo switch, and a Wii U. Likes to play BF1 and V, Roblox, Splatoon, SMBU, War Thunder, SWB2, MK8D, and more. I don’t play too often, since I don’t want to spend too much on Video Games every day, Or maybe if I get interested, I play some more.

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: Sorry for the inconvenience. Let me introduce myself. My name’s Edgar.H, a Puerto Rican, A Lego builder, soon I’ll become a game designer and developer. Likes to build and make my own OCs, Vehicles, and more. Have a lot of stuff to do irl, if i get the chance.

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: And yes, there will be 18+ stuff, which is why I have a 18+ next to my name.

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: There will be a lot of new OCs, Vehicles, Elites, Battles, Events, Locations, and more from State War 1. Hope you’re interested with this new kind of stuff.

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: State War 1 is an Alternative real time War that takes place in Florida and Puerto Rico (2017). The War lasted from August-September 2015 to December 2019. The Plot is complicating sometimes, since changes happened back then when I was young.

author: TheRepublicBoy🇵🇷
text: So you might be thinking, “What the hell is State War 1?” Well…I’ll be glad to tell all about it. One. At. A. Time.
